message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. This product is truly top-of-the-line and worth every penny. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,500? I really think this product could be a great fit for me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it.
